entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
